attributes.action: Raise awareness to abolish the Illegal immigrant Bill and Rwanda plan.
attributes.additional_details: The UDHR is meant to gives freedoms and rights that deserve universal protection for every individual to live their lives freely, equ­­ally and in dignity.  The new bill created against Illegal immigrants is clearly breaching their freedom of movement. One signature is a step closer to equality! The government should protect all humans and their rights, including illegal immigrants whilst throwing out this bill.
attributes.background: With the support of both the Labour and Lib Dem party, we would like you to help and support us with this issue we are passionate towards and rightfully want to make a change as soon as we can. Force the government to debate and change this law.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  
 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640382
